Class Simulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • Simulator

  • public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
    The Simulator class loads the configuration and runs each router with the correct class for that router as specified in the configurtion file. At each time step the Simulator carries out (in order) event processing process_events, routers tasks process_routers, packet forwarding process_packets
    Since:
    JDK1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Simulator(java.lang.String cf)
      Simulator constructor, loads the configuration given the config file cf.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add_events(java.util.Vector<Event> e)
      Adds the events created in the Config class to the the simulator.
      void add_links(java.util.Vector<Link> l)
      Adds the links created in the Config class to the the simulator and attaches them to the router objects.
      void add_routers(java.util.Vector<Router> r)
      Adds the routers created in the Config class to the the simulator.
      void main_loop()
      Main loop of the simulator that runs through all the tasks at each time step.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      main function called from the command line with one argument which is the configuration file.
      void set_stop_time(int t)
      Sets the duration for the simulation.

      Simple toString method.

        public void main_loop()
